participant_1.background:
I went through a lot of changes in a short amount of time.
The most valuable thing I own is my ability to persevere through challenges.
i have two tattoos.
i love role play.

participant_2.background:
I am excited to start my new job at McDonald's.
I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy.
i like to play guitar.
i take things very literally.
i am in the navy.

content.text: Hi! Whats up?
Not much! I'm excited to start my new job at McDonald's.  How about you?
Hey thats cool! I just got back from a long hiking trip. I really enjoy it.
I love hiking too! I wish I had more time to do it.
Yeah it can be hard to find the time.  Do you have any tattoos?
No I don't have any tattoos but I've been thinking about getting one.
I have two.  One on my back and one on my arm.  I love them both.
Cool!  What are they of?
The one on my back is a forest and the one on my arm is a wolf.
Wow those sound really cool!  I'm not sure what I would get.
Well if you ever do decide to get one I recommend getting something you're really passionate about.
Thanks for the advice!  I'll keep that in mind.
No problem!  So what else do you like to do besides hike?
I play guitar and I like to go to the beach.
That's cool! I play guitar too.  I'm not very good at it but it's fun.  Do you like any particular kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music but I mostly listen to rock and roll.
Cool!  I like rock and roll too.  What's your favorite band?
I don't really have a favorite band but I like a lot of different bands.
That's cool!  I like a lot of different bands too.  Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really.  I might go to the beach or watch a movie.
That sounds like a good plan.  I'm going to go hiking again this weekend.
Nice!  I wish I could go hiking with you.
Maybe next time
